verses.verse: In the <S%H259>first<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H1867>Darius<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H325>Ahasuerus,<s%> of the <S%H4480>seed<s%> <S%H2233><s%> of the <S%H4074>Medes,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> was made <S%H4427>king<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H4438>realm<s%> of the <S%H3778>Chaldeans;<s%>

In the <S%H259>first<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of his <S%H4427>reign<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> <S%H1840>Daniel<s%> <S%H995>understood<s%> by <S%H5612>books<s%> the <S%H4557>number<s%> of the <S%H8141>years,<s%> <S%H834>whereof<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet,<s%> that he would <S%H4390>accomplish<s%> <S%H7657>seventy<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> in the <S%H2723>desolations<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>

And I <S%H5414>set<s%> <S%H853><s%> my <S%H6440>face<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H430>God,<s%> to <S%H1245>seek<s%> by <S%H8605>prayer<s%> and <S%H8469>supplications,<s%> with <S%H6685>fasting,<s%> and <S%H8242>sackcloth,<s%> and ashes: <S%H665><s%>

And I <S%H6419>prayed<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> my <S%H430>God,<s%> and made my <S%H3034>confession,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H577>O<s%> <S%H136>Lord,<s%> the <S%H1419>great<s%> and <S%H3372>dreadful<s%> <S%H410>God,<s%> <S%H8104>keeping<s%> the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> and <S%H2617>mercy<s%> to them that <S%H157>love<s%> him, and to them that <S%H8104>keep<s%> his <S%H4687>commandments;<s%>

We have <S%H2398>sinned,<s%> and have committed <S%H5753>iniquity,<s%> and have done <S%H7561>wickedly,<s%> and have <S%H4775>rebelled,<s%> even by <S%H5493>departing<s%> from thy <S%H4480>precepts<s%> <S%H4687><s%> and from thy <S%H4480>judgments:<s%> <S%H4941><s%>

Neither <S%H3808><s%> have we <S%H8085>hearkened<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> thy <S%H5650>servants<s%> the <S%H5030>prophets,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> in thy <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> our <S%H4428>kings,<s%> our <S%H8269>princes,<s%> and our <S%H1>fathers,<s%> and <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H776>land.<s%>

O <S%H136>Lord,<s%> <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> belongeth unto thee, but unto us <S%H1322>confusion<s%> of <S%H6440>faces,<s%> as at <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day;<s%> to the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and to the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> and unto <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> that are <S%H7138>near,<s%> and that are far <S%H7350>off,<s%> through <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>countries<s%> <S%H834>whither<s%> <S%H8033><s%> thou hast <S%H5080>driven<s%> them, because of their <S%H4604>trespass<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> they have <S%H4603>trespassed<s%> against thee.

O <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> to us belongeth <S%H1322>confusion<s%> of <S%H6440>face,<s%> to our <S%H4428>kings,<s%> to our <S%H8269>princes,<s%> and to our <S%H1>fathers,<s%> <S%H834>because<s%> we have <S%H2398>sinned<s%> against thee.
To the <S%H136>Lord<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> belong <S%H7356>mercies<s%> and <S%H5547>forgivenesses,<s%> <S%H3588>though<s%> we have <S%H4775>rebelled<s%> against him;

Neither <S%H3808><s%> have we <S%H8085>obeyed<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H430>God,<s%> to <S%H1980>walk<s%> in his <S%H8451>laws,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H5414>set<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> us <S%H3027>by<s%> his <S%H5650>servants<s%> the <S%H5030>prophets.<s%>

Yea, <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> have <S%H5674>transgressed<s%> <S%H853><s%> thy <S%H8451>law,<s%> even by <S%H5493>departing,<s%> that they might <S%H1115>not<s%> <S%H8085>obey<s%> thy <S%H6963>voice;<s%> therefore the <S%H423>curse<s%> is <S%H5413>poured<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> us, and the <S%H7621>oath<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> is <S%H3789>written<s%> in the <S%H8451>law<s%> of <S%H4872>Moses<s%> the <S%H5650>servant<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> we have <S%H2398>sinned<s%> against him.

And he hath <S%H6965>confirmed<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H1697>words,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> us, and <S%H5921>against<s%> our <S%H8199>judges<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H8199>judged<s%> us, by <S%H935>bringing<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> us a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H7451>evil:<s%> <S%H834>for<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H8064>heaven<s%> hath <S%H3808>not<s%> been <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H834>as<s%> hath been <S%H6213>done<s%> upon <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>

As <S%H834><s%> it is <S%H3789>written<s%> in the <S%H8451>law<s%> of <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> is <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> us: yet made we not our <S%H2470>prayer<s%> <S%H3808><s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H430>God,<s%> that we might <S%H7725>turn<s%> from our <S%H4480>iniquities,<s%> <S%H5771><s%> and <S%H7919>understand<s%> thy <S%H571>truth.<s%>

Therefore hath the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H8245>watched<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H7451>evil,<s%> and <S%H935>brought<s%> it <S%H5921>upon<s%> us: <S%H3588>for<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> is <S%H6662>righteous<s%> <S%H5921>in<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H4639>works<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H6213>doeth:<s%> for we <S%H8085>obeyed<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> his <S%H6963>voice.<s%>

And <S%H6258>now,<s%> O <S%H136>Lord<s%> our <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> hast brought thy people <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H5971><s%> out of the <S%H4480>land<s%> <S%H776><s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> with a <S%H2389>mighty<s%> <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and hast <S%H6213>gotten<s%> thee <S%H8034>renown,<s%> as at <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day;<s%> we have <S%H2398>sinned,<s%> we have done <S%H7561>wickedly.<s%>

O <S%H136>Lord,<s%> according to <S%H3605>all<s%> thy <S%H6666>righteousness,<s%> I beseech <S%H4994>thee,<s%> let thine <S%H639>anger<s%> and thy <S%H2534>fury<s%> be turned <S%H7725>away<s%> from thy <S%H4480>city<s%> <S%H5892><s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> thy <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H2022>mountain:<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> for our <S%H2399>sins,<s%> and for the <S%H5771>iniquities<s%> of our <S%H1>fathers,<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> and thy <S%H5971>people<s%> are become a <S%H2781>reproach<s%> to <S%H3605>all<s%> that are <S%H5439>about<s%> us.

Now <S%H6258><s%> therefore, O our <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H8085>hear<s%> <S%H413><s%> the <S%H8605>prayer<s%> of thy <S%H5650>servant,<s%> and his <S%H8469>supplications,<s%> and cause thy <S%H6440>face<s%> to <S%H215>shine<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> thy <S%H4720>sanctuary<s%> that is <S%H8076>desolate,<s%> for the Lord's <S%H4616>sake.<s%> <S%H136><s%>

O my <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H5186>incline<s%> thine <S%H241>ear,<s%> and <S%H8085>hear;<s%> <S%H6491>open<s%> thine <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> and <S%H7200>behold<s%> our <S%H8074>desolations,<s%> and the <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H5921>by<s%> thy <S%H8034>name:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H587>we<s%> do <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H5307>present<s%> our <S%H8469>supplications<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> thee <S%H5921>for<s%> our <S%H6666>righteousnesses,<s%> <S%H3588>but<s%> <S%H5921>for<s%> thy <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H7356>mercies.<s%>

O <S%H136>Lord,<s%> <S%H8085>hear;<s%> O <S%H136>Lord,<s%> <S%H5545>forgive;<s%> O <S%H136>Lord,<s%> <S%H7181>hearken<s%> and <S%H6213>do;<s%> <S%H309>defer<s%> <S%H408>not,<s%> for thine own <S%H4616>sake,<s%> O my <S%H430>God:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> thy <S%H5892>city<s%> and thy <S%H5971>people<s%> are <S%H7121>called<s%> by thy <S%H8034>name.<s%>

And <S%H5750>while<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> was <S%H1696>speaking,<s%> and <S%H6419>praying,<s%> and <S%H3034>confessing<s%> my <S%H2403>sin<s%> and the <S%H2403>sin<s%> of my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H5307>presenting<s%> my <S%H8467>supplication<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> my <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5921>for<s%> the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H2022>mountain<s%> of my <S%H430>God;<s%>

Yea, <S%H5750>while<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> was <S%H1696>speaking<s%> in <S%H8605>prayer,<s%> even the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H1403>Gabriel,<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> I had <S%H7200>seen<s%> in the <S%H2377>vision<s%> at the <S%H8462>beginning,<s%> being caused to <S%H3286>fly<s%> <S%H3288>swiftly,<s%> <S%H5060>touched<s%> <S%H413><s%> me about the <S%H6256>time<s%> of the <S%H6153>evening<s%> <S%H4503>oblation.<s%>

And he <S%H995>informed<s%> me, and <S%H1696>talked<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> me, and <S%H559>said,<s%> O <S%H1840>Daniel,<s%> I am <S%H6258>now<s%> come <S%H3318>forth<s%> to give thee <S%H7919>skill<s%> and <S%H998>understanding.<s%>

At the <S%H8462>beginning<s%> of thy <S%H8469>supplications<s%> the <S%H1697>commandment<s%> came <S%H3318>forth,<s%> and <S%H589>I<s%> am <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H5046>show<s%> thee; <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> art greatly <S%H2530>beloved:<s%> therefore <S%H995>understand<s%> the <S%H1697>matter,<s%> and <S%H995>consider<s%> the <S%H4758>vision.<s%>

Seventy <S%H7657><s%> <S%H7620>weeks<s%> are <S%H2852>determined<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> thy <S%H5971>people<s%> and <S%H5921>upon<s%> thy <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H5892>city,<s%> to <S%H3607>finish<s%> the <S%H6588>transgression,<s%> and to make an <S%H2856>end<s%> of <S%H2403>sins,<s%> and to make <S%H3722>reconciliation<s%> for <S%H5771>iniquity,<s%> and to bring <S%H935>in<s%> <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H6664>righteousness,<s%> and to seal <S%H2856>up<s%> the <S%H2377>vision<s%> and <S%H5030>prophecy,<s%> and to <S%H4886>anoint<s%> the most <S%H6944>Holy.<s%> <S%H6944><s%>

Know <S%H3045><s%> therefore and <S%H7919>understand,<s%> that <S%H4480>from<s%> the going <S%H4161>forth<s%> of the <S%H1697>commandment<s%> to <S%H7725>restore<s%> and to <S%H1129>build<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> <S%H5704>unto<s%> the <S%H4899>Messiah<s%> the <S%H5057>Prince<s%> shall be <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H7620>weeks,<s%> and <S%H8346>threescore<s%> and <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H7620>weeks:<s%> the <S%H7339>street<s%> shall be <S%H1129>built<s%> <S%H7725>again,<s%> and the <S%H2742>wall,<s%> even in <S%H6695>troublous<s%> <S%H6256>times.<s%>

And <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H8346>threescore<s%> and <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H7620>weeks<s%> shall <S%H4899>Messiah<s%> be cut <S%H3772>off,<s%> but <S%H369>not<s%> for himself: and the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H5057>prince<s%> that shall <S%H935>come<s%> shall <S%H7843>destroy<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> and the <S%H6944>sanctuary;<s%> and the <S%H7093>end<s%> thereof shall be with a <S%H7858>flood,<s%> and <S%H5704>unto<s%> the <S%H7093>end<s%> of the <S%H4421>war<s%> <S%H8074>desolations<s%> are <S%H2782>determined.<s%>

And he shall <S%H1396>confirm<s%> the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with <S%H7227>many<s%> for <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7620>week:<s%> and in the <S%H2677>midst<s%> of the <S%H7620>week<s%> he shall cause the <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> and the <S%H4503>oblation<s%> to <S%H7673>cease,<s%> and <S%H5921>for<s%> the <S%H3671>overspreading<s%> of <S%H8251>abominations<s%> he shall make it <S%H8074>desolate,<s%> even <S%H5704>until<s%> the <S%H3617>consummation,<s%> and that <S%H2782>determined<s%> shall be <S%H5413>poured<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H8076>desolate.<s%>
